# Ignore OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
~*

# Ignore compiled files and folders (not likely in pure HTML)
*.class
*.pyc
*.o
*.out

# Ignore node_modules or dependencies (if you were to use any frontend tooling)
node_modules/
dist/
build/

# Ignore IDE/editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# Ignore files for deployment (if any)
.env

# Ignore image output/test files (if generated by any scripts)
images/
output/
